thread.title: Dee Farquhar

author: Dee Farquhar
title: Dee Farquhar
text:
Just returned from vacation and this was first time we had used TrustedHousesitters....we were so impressed with our sitter, the dogs were impeccably cared for and the house was immaculate.
I would definitely reccommend TrustedHousesitters from our experience.
We will certainly be using them again when planning our next trip....we have never put our dogs in kennels and never would, we've always chose friends and family to sit for us but with us moving to France this just isn't an option now...finding TrustedHousesitters has totally transformed our lives now, to go on vacation where it's not suitable to take the dogs, we can go knowing they're in perfect hands.
